meta.content: 最新中国新闻 |今日突发新闻 |路透社
Reuters.com 是您获取最新中国新闻报道和时事的在线资源，确保我们的读者了解最新的突发新闻动态
Latest China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments

li.div:
中美战略较量亚太范畴中国银行董事长访问巴布亚新几内亚· 之前未定义
中国银行董事长葛海蛟已前往巴布亚新几内亚 (PNG)，作为世界第四大银行在这个太平洋岛国寻求营业执照，该国正在寻求促进中国贸易，同时扩大与美国的防务关系。

img.alt: 一包美国五美元钞票在华盛顿制版印刷局接受检查

div.a: 随着美联储 6 月押注减弱、债务上限协议接近尾声，美元走低

    ;Information you can trust

    ;

    ;Reuters, the news and media division of Thomson Reuters, is the world's largest multimedia news provider , reaching billions of people worldwide every day. Reuters provides business, financial, national and international news to professionals via desktop terminals, the world's media organizations, industry events and directly to consumers.
